name: AVAX
description:
AVAX WARRIORS are a collection 8,888 Warriors. They were created by Alfa, the worlds most advanced Artificial Intelligence. In 2077, Alfa created 8,888 cloned versions of her consciousness. They were each placed into a 1 of 1 robotic suit that the conscious can control. In essence, each AVAXWARRIOR is Alfa. They work to her regime, order and demands. Their mission is to defend Alfa at all costs and to further the knowledge and evolution of human consciousness.

Diplomat Warriors are the politicians within Alfa's Army. They are uniquely positioned within the WEB3 world to ensure Alfa's presence is felt around the world. Each Diplomat was carefully selected by Alfa herself with a view to raising awareness for her mission. Diplomat Warriors possess rare items that will not be found within the AVAX WARRIOR army.

This warrior is a specialist in quick finality. Any mission, any task, simply allocate it to Avalanche and await almost instant completion. As one of Alfa's most trusted Diplomat's, Avalanche is positioned close to the Honey Nest to keep a watchful eye over Megacorp.
